price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ បណ្ដាអ្នកដែលកោតខ្លាចអល់ឡោះ គឺ ទទួលបានឋានសួគ៌ណាអ៊ីមពីម្ចាស់របស់ពួកគេជាមិនខាន។
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
